name: Presti AI
headline: Helping furniture companies create product visuals with AI
description:
Furniture companies spend millions and months each year on photoshoots or CGI to create product images as these visuals are crucial for driving sales.

Presti offers a faster and cheaper solution powered by generative AI. Unlike other generative AI tools, our core model is optimized for furniture products and includes multiple features tailored to the unique needs of furniture industry.

We have 100 paying B2B users with a 10% growth week over week.
We raised a $3.5M seed round

founders.name: Nabil Toumi, Founder

Was the automation lead at Uber, where I created a team that saved €20M in a year, earning me a top 1% employee award.
Alumnus of Centrale Paris and ESSEC

founders.description: Generative AI Founder @Presti AI | Furniture imagery with AI 🚀 |

founders.description:
I was the Head of Data at Scibids, an AdTech scale-up sold to DoubleVerify for $125M, where I oversaw the AI team in developing cutting-edge real-time bidding solutions.
Centrale Paris x MVA Alumni

generated_description:
**Presti AI: Revolutionizing Furniture Imagery with AI**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Presti AI is on a mission to help furniture companies create stunning product visuals quickly and cost-effectively. Recognizing that traditional photography and CGI can drain both time and money—some companies spend millions annually on these efforts—Presti AI developed a generative AI solution tailored specifically for the furniture industry.

### What They Do

Presti AI provides a platform for furniture retailers and manufacturers to generate photorealistic images in seconds. This innovative tool eliminates the long waits and high costs associated with conventional photo shoots and 3D renderings. With its unique model optimized for furniture, Presti offers features like:

- **Color Variations:** Easily adjust colors without any technical knowledge.
- **Background Removal:** Effortlessly enhance product images by removing backgrounds and adding accessories.
- **AI-Generated Staging:** Create immersive backgrounds that reflect your brand’s aesthetic.
- **High-Converting Edits:** Tailor your images to meet marketing needs by removing unwanted elements and adjusting proportions.

### Growth and Recognition

With 100 paying B2B users and a strong growth rate of 10% week over week, Presti is clearly making waves in the furniture sector. They've secured a $3.5M seed round, backed by reputable investors like Partech. The company operates from its base in Paris, currently employing a dedicated team of seven.

### Customer Love

Testimonials from clients underscore Presti’s impact:

- **Vivek Singhania:** "Presti undoubtedly leads in offering the most superior AI technology for developing lifestyle pictures—paving a fresh avenue beyond CGI and traditional photo shoots."
- **Constance Fouquet:** Not only does Presti reduce marketing costs, but it also accelerates product launch cycles, making it a game-changer in business.

### Bottom Line

Presti AI stands out not just as a tool but as a transformative solution that addresses core inefficiencies in the furniture industry. If you're part of this sector and looking to enhance your product imagery without the hassle or expense of traditional methods, give Presti AI a try with their free trial available on their website [Presti AI](https://www.presti.ai).
